column5: Has anyone ever had problems booking accomodations in Nipawin during busy times? Would you be interested in seeing more rental cabins along the lake, or are there enough already. Thanks for the input.Dave

Hey there,It is never a problem. If you are looking to start your own cabins, i would strongly suggest that you look somewhere else. There are almost always plenty of cabins availible, and if not that, there are hotel rooms in Nipawin. I would suggest you look to one of the other many many lakes in sask., and maybe start something there, you won't find much buisness at nipawin/tobin.Pikeman
